name: The Last Frontier
description:
You are the last surviving person on earth, between you and the hordes of zombies, only the walls of your bunker. Learn how to build weapons and turrets, protect yourself and your base, but remember, sooner or later they will break through your defenses.

  • 16 weapons
  • 8 defense turrets
  • 4 difficulty levels
  • Unique graphics
  • Author's soundtracks from the developer

Welcome to the game "The Last Frontier" and enjoy the game. :)

* No assets *
